use-cases-items.title: Get Liquidity Without Selling Your Crypto

details.title: Unlock Liquidity to Finance DeFi Opportunities & Real World Purchases
details.description: Unlock value from your existing crypto. Finance tangible real-world assets, like a new home or car. Take advantage of DeFi with your liquidity â€” whether you're eyeing a trending token or eager to engage with an emerging protocol.

use-cases-items.title: Amplify Exposure to your Crypto with downside protection

details.title: Use Your Crypto to Buy More Crypto
details.description: Summer.fi Multiply Vaults make it easy to get increased exposure to your crypto in one transaction. Use your multiply vault flexibly, from conservative to aggressive or manual to automated strategies.

use-cases-items.title: Maximize Earnings on your Crypto Assets

details.title: Crypto Yield; Passive or Active
details.description: Summer.fi Earn Vaults allow you to tailor your yield strategy to your portfolio. Earn passively on your favourite crypto assets, earn exclusive token rewards or actively manage positions.
